page.title: 12Leisure Activities
page.content: There are plenty of leisure activities to do in Elston.Every Tuesday I go dancing in the hall with Mrs Elston.There is a pony club which lots of girls go to.Every Friday there is a roller disco at the village hall,its Â£1.00 for an hour and a free packet of crisps, but more people go to Bingham skating because the floor is much bigger and its only Â£1.00 for an hour and a half.I go shopping every Saturday with my family for clothes and things.There are plenty of long walks about Elston.Some boys go fishing at Car Dike bridge.Boys with Bmx's go to a Bmx track at Farndon or Newark.Somestimes I help mum do the cleaning or hoovering and sometimes peal the potatoes.Children go to the shop for sweets.There is a pub,some new people have moved in so now a lot more people go for a drink.
